hanzi-su-wiki:
勢

Значения

Сила, энергия; влияние; тенденция

Мнемоника

Сила 力,необходимая, чтобы разбить 丸 почву 土 и разделить её слои.

Варианты

势, 㔟
purpleculture_pinyin:
shì
power; influence; potential; momentum; tendency; trend; situation; conditions; outward appearance; sign; gesture; male genitals
мощность; влияние; потенциал; импульс; тенденция; тенденция; ситуация; условия; внешний вид; знак; жест; мужские гениталии

heisig_chinese_memo: The rice seedlings still stuck in the soil gather round in a circle and take power pills. Their combined power forces them out of the ground at last.
heisig_constituent: forces, mini-tractor, rice seedlings, soil, dirt, ground, human legs, fat man, musashimaru, round, nine, baseball, drop, power, muscle, arnold, soil2, dirt2, ground2
heisig_story: Rice seedlings . . ground . . . fat man . . . muscle.
koohiiStory1: What power makes rice seedlings in the ground grow into well rounded plants? The forces of nature.
koohiiStory2: The forces of nature need to be just right for the rice seedlings in the ground to become fat and strong.
jp_example_words:
形勢(けいせい): condition, situation, prospects
情勢(じょうせい): state of things, condition, situation
勢力(せいりょく): influence, power, might, strength, potency, force, energy
態勢(たいせい): attitude, conditions, preparations
優勢(ゆうせい): superiority, superior power, predominance, preponderance
勢い(いきおい): force, vigor, energy, spirit, life, authority, influence, power, might, tendency, necessarily
姿勢(しせい): attitude, posture
大勢(おおぜい): many, a great number (of people)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: The womb is a circle of power where a force of nature is formed. The womb has the power to create life. Life is a force of nature, and the circle of life starts in the womb.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine yourself in the womb. You’re being born into the world. Feel the force and energy of your mother around you. Hear the sound of water as you float about in the womb. Force yourself to breathe the fluid and imagine yourself doing so.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Now pretend you are the pregnant woman. You need to force that baby out of you with such force that the baby comes flying out, so you grab hold of your special saber (せい)! You close your eyes, breathe and feel the force of the saber entering your body. Then the baby is forced right out!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: As the baby is forced out, you slice with your saber and cut the umbilical cord before the baby is caught in a basket!
Ru_Radicals: 丶 (капля), 儿 (ножки), 力 (сила), 九 (девять), 土 (земля)
Ru_trainchinese: shì: (графема) сила, влияние; импульс; внешний вид; поза; обстоятельство; мужские гениталии
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the effort (力) to get round the ground ahead (埶) is vigorous
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Applying any kind of force with your arms requires clenching your fingers and using some muscle.
humanum_full_description_en:
Originally used "埶" to mean " potential ", but later differentiated into " potential ". " Positiveness " starts with " force " and "埶" sound. The original meaning is power and power. "Shuowen Xinfu": "Power, power and power. Congli, sound." Such as "Warring States Policy. "Qin Ceyi": "In the world of life, the position of wealth and wealth, Gai can be unexpected!" "Han Feizi. The Foreign Reserve said the lower right": "If the owner does not practice skills, he will be less powerful and the minister is good at fame."

" Position " means strength. Such as "Mencius. "Gao Zi Shang": "Is it the nature of the water? The power is also true." "Shang Junshu. "Forbidden Envoy": "Today's husband Fei Peng meets the wind, and travels thousands of miles, riding on the wind."

" Shi " means the situation and situation. "Jade articles. Ministry of Forces: "Position, situation also." Such as "Warring States Policy. "Qi Ce III": "With the power of the world, we have to do everything together." "Lu Shi Chun Qiu. "Chajin": "There are seventy-two saints in the world, and their laws are all different, but the affairs are the opposite, and the times are different." It also indicates the position and status of people or things. Such as "Han Feizi. Lonely Indignation: "Humble position, no party and loneliness."

" Shi " also means momentum. Such as "Mandarin. "Wu Yu": "Please Wang Lishi, in order to strengthen his friends." Wang Nian Sun Yun: ""Peng" is pronounced "Feng". "Feng Shi", the power of anger is also." Tang Dynasty Li Bai "Sleepwalking Tianmu Yinliu Farewell" "Tianmao keeps the sky facing the sky horizontally, pulling up the five mountains to cover the Chicheng."

" Situation " also specifically refers to the reproductive organs of males or male animals. Such as "Book of Jin. "Criminal Law History": "The thief cuts off his hand, and there is no use to recover the theft. The adulterer cuts off his power, and the reason is the same." "Mengxi Bi Tan. Magazine One: "The castration of six animals will make them more fleshy and no more ears."
humanum_short_description_en: Originally, "埶" was used to mean " potential ", but later differentiated into " potential ." " Positiveness " starts with " force " and "埶" sound. The original meaning is power and power.
humanum_full_description:
本以「埶」表示「勢」，後來分化出「勢」。「勢」從「力」，「埶」聲。本義是權力、權勢。《說文新附》：「勢，盛力權也。从力，埶聲。」如《戰國策．秦策一》：「人生世上，勢位富貴，蓋可忽乎哉！」《韓非子．外儲說右下》：「人主者不操術，則威勢輕而臣擅名。」

　　「勢」表示力量。如《孟子．告子上》：「是豈水之性哉？其勢則然也。」《商君書．禁使》：「今夫飛蓬遇飄風，而行千里，乘風之勢也。」

　　「勢」表示形勢、情況。《玉篇．力部》：「勢，形勢也。」如《戰國策．齊策三》：「是以天下之勢，不得不事齊也。」《呂氏春秋．察今》：「是故有天下七十二聖，其法皆不同，非務相反也，時勢異也。」又表示人或物的位置、地位。如《韓非子．孤憤》：「處勢卑賤，無黨孤特。」

　　「勢」也表示氣勢。如《國語．吳語》：「請王勵士，以奮其朋勢。」王念孫云：「『朋』讀為『馮』。『馮勢』，盛怒之勢也。」唐代李白〈夢游天姥吟留別〉：「天姥連天向天橫，勢拔五嶽掩赤城。」

　　「勢」還特指男性或雄性動物的生殖器官。如《晉書．刑法志》：「盜者截手，無所用復盜。淫者割其 勢，理亦如之。」《夢溪筆談．雜誌一》：「六畜去勢，則多肉而不復有子耳。」
humanum_short_description: 本以「埶」表示「勢」，後來分化出「勢」。「勢」從「力」，「埶」聲。本義是權力、權勢。

本以「 埶 」表示「 勢 」，後來分化出「 勢 」。「 勢 」從「 力 」，「 埶 」聲。本義是權力、權勢。《說文新附》：「勢，盛力權也。从力，埶聲。」如《戰國策．秦策一》：「人生世上，勢位富貴，蓋可忽乎哉！」《韓非子．外儲說右下》：「人主者不操術，則威勢輕而臣擅名。」 「 勢 」表示力量。如《孟子．告子上》：「是豈水之性哉？其勢則然也。」《商君書．禁使》：「今夫飛蓬遇飄風，而行千里，乘風之勢也。」 「 勢 」表示形勢、情況。《玉篇．力部》：「勢，形勢也。」如《戰國策．齊策三》：「是以天下之勢，不得不事齊也。」《呂氏春秋．察今》：「是故有天下七十二聖，其法皆不同，非務相反也，時勢異也。」又表示人或物的位置、地位。如《韓非子．孤憤》：「處勢卑賤，無黨孤特。」 「 勢 」也表示氣勢。如《國語．吳語》：「請王勵士，以奮其朋勢。」王念孫云：「『朋』讀為『馮』。『馮勢』，盛怒之勢也。」唐代李白〈夢游天姥吟留別〉：「天姥連天向天橫，勢拔五嶽掩赤城。」 「 勢 」還特指男性或雄性動物的生殖器官。如《晉書．刑法志》：「盜者截手，無所用復盜。淫者割其 勢，理亦如之。」《夢溪筆談．雜誌一》：「六畜去勢，則多肉而不復有子耳。」

勢字的基本解释

勢
shì
见“势”。

勢字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shì］
［《廣韻》舒制切，去祭，書。］
“埶2”的今字。亦作“埶2”。“势1”的繁体字。
(1)权力，权势。
(2)力量；气势。
(3)形势，情势。
(4)姿态。
(5)样式；架式。
(6)男性生殖器。
(7)指动物的卵巢和睾丸。
(8)文体名。汉崔瑗有《草书势》（见南朝梁任昉《文章缘起》），蔡邕有《隶势》、《篆势》。

勢字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【力字部】　勢； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页149第04
【唐韻】舒制切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】始制切，?音世。【說文】盛權力也。【孟子】好善而忘勢。又【廣韻】形勢。【易·坤卦】地勢坤。又【增韻】氣燄也。【書·君?】毋倚勢作威。又【韻會】外腎爲勢。宮?，男子割勢。又【韻補】叶式列切，音設。【木華·海賦】羣山旣略，百川潛渫。泱漭澹泞，騰波赴勢。

勢字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
勢字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shì］
["Guangyun" Shu Zhiqie, go to sacrifice, book. ]
The present character of "埶2". Also known as "埶2". Traditional characters of "势1".
(1) Power, power.
(2) Strength; momentum.
(3) Situation and situation.
(4) Posture.
(5) Style; rack style.
(6) Male genitalia.
(7) Refers to the ovaries and testes of animals.
(8) The name of the style. Han Cuiyuan has "Course Script Shi" (see Liang Renfang "The Origin of Articles" in the Southern Dynasties), and Cai Yong has "Li Shi" and "Zhong Shi".

Name meaning

shì
вм. 势
Radicals: 坴, 丸, 力  (womb, circle, power)
Meaning Mnemonic
The womb is a circle of power where a force of nature is formed. The womb has the power to create life. Life is a force of nature, and the circle of life starts in the womb.
Imagine yourself in the womb. You’re being born into the world. Feel the force and energy of your mother around you. Hear the sound of water as you float about in the womb. Force yourself to breathe the fluid and imagine yourself doing so.
Reading Mnemonic
Now pretend you are the pregnant woman. You need to force that baby out of you with such force that the baby comes flying out, so you grab hold of your special saber (せい)! You close your eyes, breathe and feel the force of the saber entering your body. Then the baby is forced right out!
As the baby is forced out, you slice with your saber and cut the umbilical cord before the baby is caught in a basket!
